about_the_game:
The platformer puzzle game



The player will have to maneuver a ball through a collection of cube platforms to reach a portal to complete the level. To open the portal, the player will have to find the key/keys. The player can roll around specific cube platforms, thus changing the orientation of the level. The player will come up again obstacles that can be quite puzzling. The complexity and level of puzzle solving required will gradually increase as the game progresses. Some areas of the level will not be reachable until skills are unlocked, which are unlocked by finding Atoms in the levels to purchase these upgrades. The player will be working against the clock at all times, 60 seconds for each level. However, the items on some levels can freeze time, flip time back, or make things harder. It will be up to the player to decide what item to pick up along the way.

Progression



As the player works their way through the game, the levels will start to seem alive as platforms begin to move around and even go translucent. More obstacles will prevent themselves.
More items on the levels.

Fununality

Moving, Turning, Jumping, Rotating, Avoiding hazards, Earning Coin, Finding Atoms to buy upgrades.
detailed_description:
The platformer puzzle game



The player will have to maneuver a ball through a collection of cube platforms to reach a portal to complete the level. To open the portal, the player will have to find the key/keys. The player can roll around specific cube platforms, thus changing the orientation of the level. The player will come up again obstacles that can be quite puzzling. The complexity and level of puzzle solving required will gradually increase as the game progresses. Some areas of the level will not be reachable until skills are unlocked, which are unlocked by finding Atoms in the levels to purchase these upgrades. The player will be working against the clock at all times, 60 seconds for each level. However, the items on some levels can freeze time, flip time back, or make things harder. It will be up to the player to decide what item to pick up along the way.

Progression



As the player works their way through the game, the levels will start to seem alive as platforms begin to move around and even go translucent. More obstacles will prevent themselves.
More items on the levels.

Fununality

Moving, Turning, Jumping, Rotating, Avoiding hazards, Earning Coin, Finding Atoms to buy upgrades.
name: Dimensions Puzzle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Tested With I5 Core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Tested With Nvidia 1050
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: TBD
  • Additional Notes: TBD

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5 Core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This game was built as an App first and is already on the App Store. I have converted it to desktop, so more people can enjoy it. Please let me know if these are any bugs from the conversion. I will fix it and update it straight away.
